title: Calliope: An Online Generative Music System for Symbolic Multi-Track Composition
author: Renaud Bougueng Tchemeube (Simon Fraser University), Jeff Ens (Simon Fraser University), Philippe Pasquier (Simon Fraser University), ...
relevance_why: The system employs a Transformer model for music generation, which could inform my own generative AI research by incorporating similar machine learning architectures and methodologies for audio applications.
background: Generating symbolic music using a web application that employs machine learning models to assist users in multi-track composition tasks.
contribution: Calliope introduces a web-based interface for generative music creation to solve the challenges in multi-track composition, achieving enhanced interactive capabilities for users.

technical_comparison.prior_work: Existing systems primarily focus on either symbolic or audio generation separately, often lacking in real-time user interaction and control.
technical_comparison.novelty: Calliope combines multi-track MIDI manipulation with an intuitive interface and rich generative parameters, allowing for a dynamic user-led compositional process.

key_innovation: The system integrates bar selection and rich parameter controls to streamline user interaction with generative models for music composition.
real_world_impact: The system could transform the composition process for both amateurs and professionals, enabling richer collaborative and creative opportunities in music production.
limitations: The current version is labeled as in beta, suggesting some limitations in functionality and user experience.

new_terms.bar in-filling: **Bar in-filling** is a generative technique that allows the model to fill in specific sections of music, ensuring continuity and coherence within multi-track compositions.
new_terms.Temperature: **Temperature** in machine learning refers to a parameter controlling the randomness of predictions in model outputs, influencing how conservative or experimental the generated results are.

open_sourcing: Calliope is publicly available at https://metacreation.net/calliope.
